definitions.text: to cause inconvenience or discomfort to
disturb in mind or make uneasy or cause to be worried or alarmed
examples: She was rather perturbed by the news that her father was seriously ill

definitions.text: take the trouble to do something; concern oneself
examples: He did not trouble to call his mother on her birthday

definitions.text: cause bodily suffering to and make sick or indisposed
causing distress or worry or anxiety
examples: lived in heroic if something distressful isolation
a revelation that was most perturbing
